Title: Relates to services for victims of domestic violence; repealer
Summary: Relates to services for victims of domestic violence; provides that the department of social services shall ensure there is sufficient access to domestic violence services in every county; eliminates per diem reimbursement rates for domestic violence programs.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to services for victims of domestic violence; and to repeal certain provisions of such law relating thereto
